class.name: PathExtrudeProfileManual
class.brief_description: A resource to define custom [PathExtrude3D] extrusion cross-section profiles.
class.description: This resource allows the user to define the cross section directly via [PackedVector2Array].

members.member: If [code]true[/code] and [param cross_section] is not already closed, the cross-section provided to the node will have an extra flat face to close the mesh.
The cross-sectional profile to extrude in the [PathExtrude3D].
If [code]true[/code], the normals of the cross-section will be smoothed.
